casebody.data:
IU HEALTH, INC. d/b/a Riley Hospital for Children, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
Mike MEECE and Natalie L. Meece, Individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of Gabriel M. Meece, Deceased Minor, Appellees-Plaintiffs. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CT-2968 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed May 28, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Reversed.
